description:
Robber Mizorogi is out to kill hacker Isehara for betraying him. Conan and Isehara flee together, but they fall off a cliff. Megure and the police search the ocean, but they`re unable to find anything after three hours. Three and a half hours earlier, while falling down the cliff, Conan ejected a soccer ball from his belt. Using the ball, Conan and Isehara rolled into the cave directly below the cliff. With Isehara`s help, Conan attempts to stop Mizorogi`s next robbery, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La disparition de Conan au bord d`une falaise, 2e partie
断崖に消えたコナン (後編)
